scripts.build: cat web/src/bosco/bosco.js LF web/src/chromestoragedb/chromestoragedb.js LF web/src/entitas/entitas.min.js LF web/src/ezgui/EZGUI.js LF web/src/howler.js/howler.min.js LF web/src/localstoragedb/localstoragedb.min.js LF web/src/pixi.js/pixi.min.js LF web/src/stats.js/stats.min.js LF web/src/tween.ts/tween.min.js > build/monkeydance.js  && cat web/src/bosco/bosco.js LF web/src/chromestoragedb/chromestoragedb.js LF web/src/entitas/entitas.min.js LF web/src/ezgui/EZGUI.js LF web/src/howler.js/howler.min.js LF web/src/localstoragedb/localstoragedb.min.js LF web/src/pixi.js/pixi.min.js LF web/src/stats.js/stats.min.js LF web/src/tween.ts/tween.min.js | java -jar packages/closure-compiler/lib/vendor/compiler.jar --compilation_level WHITESPACE_ONLY --js_output_file build/monkeydance.min.js
scripts.clean: rm -rf build/* && mkdir -p build && mkdir -p build/web && mkdir -p build/lib
scripts.closure: npm run transpile && tools/convert && java -jar tools/plovr.jar build config.js
scripts.deploy: cp -rf web/res ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets && cp -rf web/src ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets && cp -f web/main.js ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets && cp -f web/project.json ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets
scripts.preandroid: npm run predeploy && npm run transpile && npm run resources && cp -fr web/res ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets
